nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Switch is a six-page Star Wars: The Clone Wars webcomic, posted on StarWars.com on January 9, 2009, leading directly into the The Clone Wars episode "The Gungan General." It was written by Pablo Hidalgo, drawn and colored by Katie Cook, and lettered by Grant Gould. Switch details the story of the Kowakian monkey-lizard Pilf Mukmuk as he tries to capture Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi and his former apprentice, Anakin Skywalker.
